overview_of_class: Students who are not making?video/broadcast their main focus can take this class to? learn field-producing techniques and story methods for reporting in video. Learning how to identify stories best told in video and structure them for their audiences, students advance their skills in shooting video using their personal hand-held cameras and editing the video on their laptops.
name: Techniques: Video Storytelling
title: JOUR JOUR 433-3-20 Techniques: Video Storytelling
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Only students in the MSJ program may enroll in these classes
